title: Land for sale in Wattala
details: 30 perches commercial land for sale in wattala facing colombo negombo main road with 35ft road frontage. Well water 3 phase electricity and pipe bone water. A valuble pice of land with clear titles can even take a bank loan without any hassle. Nearest land mark is dias and dias and this land is situated infront of arangala weda madura. Suitable for any business a good location. Call me for more details expecting 1.65 million a perch (16.5 lakhs) negotiable after inspection. For immediate sale.
